property.name: browser.fullName
property.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_8_2) AppleWebKit/537.17 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/24.0.1312.52 Safari/537.17

testcase.name: returns an Object
has 3 methods: bind, unbind & trigger
discourages having multiple similar event names with any relationships between them not being discernable to the app
encourages structuring and conceptually grouping events
allows you to bind listeners to respond to all events of a broader type
calls all listeners bound to the same event type & scope
calls all listeners when an event is triggered at an enclosing scope
ignores attempts to deeply trigger every listener bound below a higher level type (it doesn't make sense)
returns an Object
has 4 methods: add, remove, get & contains
returns null if no listeners are bound to the supplied scope
returns an Array of all listeners bound to a single scope, when passing a single scope
does not return listeners bound to broader scopes, when passing a single scope
does not return listeners bound to narrower scopes, when passing a single scope
returns an Array including listeners bound with wildcard capturing scopes that enclose the passed scope
returns an Array not including listeners bound with wildcard capturing scopes beneath the passed scope
ignores requests to remove listeners bound to a scope when there are none
removes listeners bound at a specific scope
returns false if the provided function is not bound at the supplied scope
returns true if the provided function is bound at the supplied scope
